titles.title: Thou Magnet Of My Soul (familiar nice easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou Magnet of my soul Let me come nearer till The life of self pulsates No more But is forever still{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou Sunshine Of my heart Fill Thou each Crevice there And let Thy garden Yield to Thee A fragrance sweet And rare{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou Ransomer From death Possess Thy Ransomed one Apporpriate to Thine Own use Thy spoil that Thou hast won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou Lord of Life And Light I bow beneath Thy sway And count it holy privilege Thy precepts to obey{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou Gift unspeakable Straight from God's heart of love I break my heart To give Thee room And thus Thy sweetness prove{/lang-eng}
